data.title: How to find us
data.text:
Our address:

Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin

Institut für Informatik

Rudower Chaussee 25

12489 Berlin

General information on S-Bahn and underground

Journey planner of BVG

Route map of BVG

Location Plan

From within Berlin using public transport

From S-Bahn station S Adlershof (Berlin):

Tram 61 (direction Schöneweide, orthogonal to S-Bahn), Tram 63 (direction Johannisthal, orthogonal to S-Bahn), oder Tram M17 (direction Falkenberg, parallel to S-Bahn) two stops to "Magnusstr."

or two stops with Bus 162 (direction Rudow) Bus 163 (direction Schöneweide) or Bus 164 (Flughafen Schönefeld) to "Magnusstr."

or

Take a 10 minutes walk in south-west direction along Rudower Chaussee until you reach the department on the left-hand side.

S-Bahn: station Berlin-Schöneweide (substitue for Adlershof)

Tram 61 (direction Rahnsdorf) or Tram M17 (direction Adlershof) to stop "Magnusstr."

From underground station Rudow:

Bus 162 (direction Adlershof) to stop "Magnusstr."

Arrival by plane

Schönefeld Airport

Bus 164 in direction S Adlershof, leave at stop Magnusstraße

departure in front of Terminal A

20-minute interval

time of travel 18min

the bus stops in front of the department

S-Bahn S9 via S-Bahnhof Adlershof (see above)

Arrival by train

You can reach the institute by exiting your train at Berlin Hauptbahnhof (main station) but, when given the choice, you should prefer stations Berlin Südkreuz or Berlin Ostbahnhof.

In all cases, use S-Bahn service to get to S-Adlershof and follow the above instruction for getting to the institute from there.

Travel times to S Adlershof:

from Hauptbahnhof: 30-40 min

from Ostbahnhof: 25-35 min

from Südkreuz: 25-35 min

From Berlin Ostbahnhof and Berlin Hauptbahnhof

The most convenient option is to take S9 in direction Schönefeld and exit at S Adlershof. Then follow the above instructions.

Alternatively, to get to S Adlershof, take S3 in direction Erkner, S5 in direction Strausberg Nord, S7 in direction Ahrensfelde, or S75 in direction Wartenberg and transfer at Ostkreuz. To do so, go to the upper platform (there are multiple ones, take the one labeled with the green S for S-Bahn). Then take S8 in direction Grünau/Zeuthen or S85 in direction Grünau. Exit at S Adlershof.

Follow the above instructions to take a tram/bus or walk to stop Magnusstraße, which is directly in front of the department.

From Berlin Südkreuz

S45 in direction Schönefeld or S46 in direction Königs Wusterhausen and exit at S Adlershof.

Follow the above instructions to take a tram/bus or walk to stop Magnusstraße, which is directly in front of the department.

Arrival by car

GPS-Navigation: +52° 25' 46.00" / +13° 31' 48.50"

From southern Berliner Ring (Autobahn):

At motorway cross Schönefelder Kreuz take the A113 in direction of airport Schönefeld.

Exit the motorway at Adlershof.

From northern Berliner Ring (autobahn):

At motorway cross Oranienburg take the A111 in direction of airport Tegel.

At motorway triangle Charlottenburg take the A100 in direction of airport Schönefeld.

At motorway triangle Neukölln take the A113 in direction of airport Schönefeld.

Exit the motorway at Adlershof.

From inner city (Alexanderplatz):

Follow B96a in direction of airport Schönefeld.

At S-Bahn station S Adlershof turn right into Rudower Chaussee.
